descriptions: The student demonstrates no understanding of addition or subtraction within 1000 and makes significant errors.
The student attempts addition and subtraction but makes frequent errors, demonstrating a limited understanding of the concepts.
The student can perform simple addition and subtraction problems with some accuracy, but struggles with more complex problems or multi-step calculations.
The student generally adds and subtracts accurately within 1000, but may make occasional errors due to carelessness or misunderstanding of place value.
The student consistently adds and subtracts accurately within 1000, demonstrating a strong understanding of place value and properties of operations.
The student demonstrates mastery of addition and subtraction within 1000, consistently solving problems accurately and efficiently, and can explain their reasoning clearly.
The student does not use any recognizable strategies or algorithms for addition and subtraction.
